name: GameZine #1
description:
The first issue of my gamezine: a collection of characters and objects I've made over the years that you can walk around and look at. 

Includes a native linux build for steamdeck!

WASD / arrow keys - walk
SH - run
space - jump

Gamepad:
L2 - run
A / South button - jump

https://github.com/dygnyc/GameZine1

// How to install to and run from steam deck SD card

  1. switch to desktop mode
  2. open dolphin (file manager)
  3.  download and extract to  your SD card
    1. var/run/media/mmcblk0p1
  4. execute GZ1_x86_64
    1. make sure your controls are set to game pad (otherwise you may get some weird behavior)
  5. On the desktop, go to the Steam client
    1.  click the “add a game” button in the lower left corner
    2.  click ‘add a Non-Steam game’
    3.  browse to the file in var/run/media/mmcblk0p1
      1. you may need to show all files
    4. add selected programs
  6. This app will now show up in the Deck UI library under the ‘non-steam’ tab.
  7. find the game and select options > Properties to rename
  8. you should be able to play it like any other game
    1. if for some reason, it doesn't seem to launch the first time, you might try restarting or steam (I had to).
